RegBussOrg.Heading: Register business organisation
RegBussOrg.PreReq: Prerequisites that User shall keep ready:
RegBussOrg.Points1: CIN number of the Company: CIN number assigned for company registration in India...
RegBussOrg.Points2: DIN number of Director of the Company: DIN of an active Director of the Company...
RegBussOrg.Note: For Aadhaar Based Esigning, it is mandatory that your mobile number is linked to your Aadhaar number.

CompanyDetails.para: Please choose the Director, who is an Indian National. This DIN owner will do the Aadhaar Based Esigning of the Terms Agreement with Mcaikname.
CompanyDetails.Note1: Note: For Aadhaar Based Esigning, it is mandatory that your mobile number is linked to your Aadhaar number.

DirectorPAN.Heading: Director Details
DirectorPAN.DOBLabel: Enter Date Of Birth Of DIN Holder
DirectorPAN.PANLabel: Enter PAN Number Of DIN Holder
DirectorPAN.AadhaarNumberLabel: Enter First 8 Digits Of Aadhaar Number
